Package org.apache.fop.complexscripts.util

Interface Summary
GlyphContextTester Interface for testing the originating (source) character context of a glyph sequence.
GlyphTester Interface for testing glyph properties according to glyph identifier.
ScriptContextTester Interface for providing script specific context testers.
 

Class Summary
CharMirror Mirror related utilities.
CharScript Script related utilities.
GlyphSequence A GlyphSequence encapsulates a sequence of character codes, a sequence of glyph codes, and a sequence of character associations, where, for each glyph in the sequence of glyph codes, there is a corresponding character association.
GlyphSequence.CharAssociation A structure class encapsulating an interval of characters expressed as an offset and count of Unicode scalar values (in an IntBuffer).
NumberConverter Implementation of Number to String Conversion algorithm specified by XSL Transformations (XSLT) Version 2.0, W3C Recommendation, 23 January 2007.
UTF32 UTF32 related utilities.
 

Exception Summary
DiscontinuousAssociationException Exception thrown during when attempting to map glyphs to associated characters in the case that the associated characters do not represent a compact interval.
